## Description {#details}

A non-threaded implementation.

## Private Member Functions

### asyncEnqueue() {#a9acfa809163ab2fcd803aec68d59a4ce}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::SingleThreadExecutor::asyncEnqueue (std::function&lt; void()&gt; Task, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup">ThreadPoolTaskGroup</a> &#42; Group)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Asynchronous submission of a task to the pool.

The returned future can be used to wait for the task to finish and is <em>non-blocking</em> on destruction.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/threadpool-h/#l00245">245</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/threadpool-h">ThreadPool.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
